components.description:
A person who wields abilities beyond those of ordinary people and is dedicated to protecting the public. Generally depicted as wearing a colorful domino mask and a cape.

This base emoji does not specify a gender, but is used to create the emojis for Man Superhero and Woman Superhero.

The Supervillain is the nemesis of this emoji.
components.title: Superhero

title: Superhero

version.description:
Unicode 11.0 was released on June 5, 2018. Emojis that require new code points for release are listed on this page but for the full 2018 emoji list see Emoji 11.0.

Emoji 11.0 includes every new emoji, including variations for skin tone, gender and new emojis that don't require additional code points, such as the chess pawn or pirate flag which are not shown on this page.

apple_vendor_description: Appleâ€™s superhero emoji strikes a powerful pose, radiating confidence and strength with its dynamic, 3D rendering. On Apple devices, this emoji features a vibrant costume with glossy highlights and realistic lighting, giving it an almost animated quality. It symbolizes courage, protection, and the ability to overcome challenges, often used to express admiration or a sense of empowerment.
